About_Organisation: Orbis is an international nonprofit that trains, mentors, and inspires eye care professionals in places with the greatest need so they can save and restore vision in their communities.
Volunteering_Roles: Onsite volunteer for events (Gala Dinner and Community Activities): Energetic volunteers, preferably with marketing or public relations experience. Be part of onsite fundraising awareness programmes on an annual basis.

Online volunteer for content writing: Volunteers preferably with journalism or public relations background, familiar with social media accounts, and interpreting data analytics is a bonus! Two short articles to be published per week.
